name: The Forest in Time
description:
Your dog ran off, you travel different mazes and forest to try to find your dog again. but yet to come.. a nightmare awaits!

Credits: Music: EdenPigeon on Soundation.com

Devs: Sam, Robert, and dylan

Files > Extract all > GameJam2020  if "Windows protected your computer" Click "More info" and "Run anyways" :)
